overview: In this gritty crime thriller, Wes and Liam are con artists trying to get away from a life of petty crime. Wes secures a job as a property manager and seemingly adjust well, whereas Liam struggles to walk away from the thrill of crime. Liam convince Wes to pull one last score, a job too easy not to screw up. Plans go awry when Wes falls for the unsuspecting victim, Steven a LGBT rights activist.
title: Welcome Home
